deleted: 🗑️ Your subscription "{name}" has been successfully deleted. Thank you for using our service! We hope to see you again soon.
deleted_auto: 🗑️ Your subscription "{name}" has been deleted from the system as it has been inactive for more than a month. If you wish to continue using our service, please purchase a new subscription.
renewed: 🔄 Your subscription has been successfully renewed for the period: {period}. ⏱️ New expiration date: {expiredAt}. Enjoy your continued access!
renewal_failed_balance: ⚠️ Failed to automatically renew your subscription for the period {period}. Insufficient funds in your balance. Required: {requiredAmount} STARS, current balance: {currentBalance} STARS. Please top up your balance to renew your subscription.
deactivated: ⏹️ Your {name} subscription has been deactivated due to expiration. To continue using it, please renew your subscription.
expiration_reminder: ⏰ Reminder! Your subscription "{name}" expires in {days} {daysText}. Expiration date: {expiredAt}.
auto_renewal_enabled:
✅ Subscription auto-renewal enabled!

Your subscription will now be automatically renewed if you have sufficient funds in your balance.
auto_renewal_disabled:
❌ Subscription auto-renewal disabled!

Your subscription will not be renewed automatically. Don't forget to renew it manually before it expires.
buy_more_traffic_and_expiration: To continue using the service, please purchase more traffic. The subscription will be deleted: {date}
